focusReader.title: Visual Gating (Focus Reader)
focusReader.content: Utilizing the 'Moving Window' paradigm to restrict peripheral vision. This eliminates the chaotic saccadic eye movements responsible for 'F-Pattern' skimming, forcing the fovea to process information linearly and increasing deep comprehension.
focusReader.featureHook: Prevents skimming by physically limiting the visual field.

vocalGym.title: The Production Effect (Vocal Gym)
vocalGym.content: The act of articulating text aloud creates a distinctive memory trace. This 'dual-coding' process synchronizes motor and auditory pathways, effectively overriding the Default Mode Network (DMN) associated with mind-wandering and racing thoughts.
vocalGym.featureHook: Engages motor pathways to override internal racing thoughts.

zenType.title: Cognitive Inhibition (Zen Type)
zenType.content: Removing the backspace safety net shifts cognitive control from 'reactive' correction to 'proactive' precision. This enforces Deliberate Practice, strengthening the prefrontal cortex's executive function to inhibit impulsive motor responses.
zenType.featureHook: Forces deliberate practice by removing error correction.
